description: This drink combines the delicious flavors of pineapple and cinnamon. It is simple to make - all it takes is some ice cubes,&nbsp;tequila, triple sec, lime juice, and the most critical ingredient:&nbsp;pineapple. Enjoy!
name: Pineapple Cinnamon Margarita
recipeIngredient: 3 cups Triple Sec or other Orange liqueur

recipeInstructions.name: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker with ice (except the powdered sugar, cinnamon sticks and pineapple slices for garnish)
recipeInstructions.text: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker with ice (except the powdered sugar, cinnamon sticks and pineapple slices for garnish)

recipeInstructions.name: Pour in a glass filled with ice.
recipeInstructions.text: Pour in a glass filled with ice.

recipeInstructions.name: Garnish with a fresh pineapple slice and serve.
recipeInstructions.text: Garnish with a fresh pineapple slice and serve.
